SEARCH
Package careerhub.models

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
careerhub.models.Opportunity
careerhub.models.Internship
public class Internship extends Opportunity
Represents a concrete internship opportunity created by a Company Representative. This class encapsulates all internship attributes such as description, academic level, preferred major, date range, company details, and visibility rules.

The opportunity goes through several lifecycle statuses (e.g., PENDING, APPROVED, FILLED) and supports rules defined by the SC2002 assignment: visibility toggling, date-based application windows, and limited slot capacity. It also maintains lists of applicant IDs and provides mechanisms for tracking confirmed placements.

This class is designed to integrate directly with Menu and DataManager logic, while still supporting extensibility through object-oriented principles.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String id, String title, String description, String levelText, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String companyName, String companyRepId, int slots)
      Constructs a new Internship instance with all required attributes. This constructor aligns with how Menu creates internship listings.
      Parameters:
      id - unique internship ID (may be null if auto-generated later)
      title - internship title
      description - job description
      levelText - internship level text (Basic/Intermediate/Advanced)
      preferredMajor - preferred major filter
      openingDate - when applications open (nullable)
      closingDate - when applications close (nullable)
      companyName - name of the offering company
      companyRepId - creator's representative ID
      slots - available positions (will be clamped to range 1–10)

      public void incrementConfirmed()

    • isOpen

      public boolean isOpen()
      Determines if the internship is currently open for applications.

      An internship is considered open if all conditions are met:

      • Status is APPROVED
      • Visibility is enabled
      • Today's date is within the opening and closing dates
      • Remaining slots are available
      Specified by:
      isOpen in class Opportunity
      Returns:
      true if students may apply

    • addApplicant

      public boolean addApplicant(String studentId)
      Adds a student ID to the applicant list if not already present.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student applying
      Returns:
      true if added successfully; false if duplicate

    • markAsFilled

      public void markAsFilled()
      Marks the internship as FILLED and sets visibility to false. Called automatically when slot capacity is fully taken.
